name: Atlantis Steakhouse Lounge
description: Enjoy elegant food, premium wines and classic cocktails while relaxing in this sophisticated hideaway adjacent to the award-winning Atlantis Steakhouse. The unique interior design features a centerpiece 1,200-gallon tropical fish tank, creating the perfect space for lively celebration with friends or a quiet conversation. Premium wines and classic cocktails in an intimate setting.
shortDescription: Sophisticated lounge with 1,200-gallon fish tank, premium wines, and classic cocktails.

faqs.question: Is this the Atlantis Steakhouse restaurant?
faqs.answer: This is the lounge adjacent to the award-winning Atlantis Steakhouse, offering elegant drinks and food.

faqs.question: What makes the lounge special?
faqs.answer: A stunning 1,200-gallon tropical fish tank serves as the centerpiece in this sophisticated space.

testimonials.quote: Atlantis Steakhouse Lounge has become our go-to after-golf hangout. Cold beers, good energy, and it's right inside atlantis-casino-resort-spa-reno. GTHS knows all the best spots.
testimonials.author: Robert R.

testimonials.quote: We ended every day of our golf trip at Atlantis Steakhouse Lounge. Great selection, friendly bartenders, and the kind of place where your group can be loud and happy after a great round.
testimonials.author: Kevin C.
